title: LFM | Tactical Gaming

embed.description: Welcome to Tactical Gaming Register now to join our community of like minded gamers. TG consists of active gamers which have a "real life first" mindset. We aim to satisfy our member's needs for team based gaming by having our Tactical Warfare franchise for warfare based games and our Tactical Sports franchise for sports based games.

body:
Tactical Gaming is a great community full of like minded gamers and year after year have produced quality out of all our members. On entry all of our members seem to climb. Whether its our attitude towards each other or our 2 weekly practice sessions, it doesn't matter because we are all about having fun. Unless of course you are strictly business. We have 1 team competing seriously and are planning to make more. 

Add me in game if you want more info or help with joining, - MAXConviction

ACCEPTING EVERYONE AND EVERYONE! ANY RANK! ANY LEVEL!
